comment.body: The possibilities are endless! If only I had more time, I would start developing something epic cool for ZeroNet.
@Zer0sum: I've got plenty of HTML, CSS and JS skills but not much time to delegate. :(
It's getting there man. ZeroNet needs a "killer app" in the form of a torrent site. The next KickassTorrents.

@Sirenyc: I saw that a few days ago and I'm hoping the dev can make it decent. In my opinion, the ultimate ZN torrent site would be like how PLAY is now but with WebTorrent integration. Just click on a video and it plays right in your browser (preferably with AirPlay / Chrome Cast support).
Or an @mention notification here on ZeroMe.
@Quadrangle @HrnekBezucha: Yeah, you would need to start from scratch or expand on the ZeroTalk codebase. Preventing the system from being gamed won't be easy to solve (if it's even possible at all).
@Jayofthezero: Like a blockchain for torrents... Interesting.
If you don't mind my asking, why learn C as opposed to a more modern language?
@Nofish: I think images would just result in lots of NSFW material people won't want to seed. For example, I don't want to accidentally seed child porn.
Be careful what you wish for ;-)

I was recently reading [Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind](magnet:?xt=urn:btih:707f1ca95ea4cb6cb427d8d6c1351df56feeebdd&dn=Sapiens%3A+A+Brief+History+of+Humankind+by+Yuval+Noah+Harari&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.leechers-paradise.org%3A6969&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Fzer0day.ch%3A1337&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Fopen.demonii.com%3A1337&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.coppersurfer.tk%3A6969&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Fexodus.desync.com%3A6969) and the author explains that the one thing that (probably) set us apart from other competing hominids was our ability to collectively imagine things (i.e. money, corporations, religions, human rights). We all believe these things are real even though they're not and it allows us to cooperate on a scale unlike any other animal on earth. You might like that book.
